extends OpModeComponent
    Operation to assist with Tank Driving

      static double leftPowerWithDirection(MotorDirection motorDirection, DriveDirection driveDirection, double power)
      Helper method to derive the left motor power the DriveDirection Based of the vehicle Drive direction, calculate the value of a single motor to see if should move forward backward , remaing in the same direction of the other motor, or come to a stop

      Examples: Drive Forward = both motors move forward Drive Forward = both motors move backward SPIN = One motor moves forward while the other backward PIVOT = One motor moves is stop while the other moves
      static MotorDirection rightMotorDirectionOn(DriveDirection driveDirection)
      Helper method to derive the right motor direction from the DriveDirection
      static double rightPowerWithDirection(MotorDirection motorDirection, DriveDirection driveDirection, double power)
      Helper method to derive the right motor power the DriveDirection Based of the vehicle Drive direction, calculate the value of a single motor to see if should move forward backward , remaing in the same direction of the other motor, or come to a stop

      Examples: Drive Forward = both motors move forward Drive Forward = both motors move backward SPIN = One motor moves forward while the other backward PIVOT = One motor moves is stop while the other moves
      void stop()
      stop the motors

      • leftPowerWithDirection

        public static double leftPowerWithDirection(MotorDirection motorDirection,
                                            DriveDirection driveDirection,
                                            double power)
        Helper method to derive the left motor power the DriveDirection Based of the vehicle Drive direction, calculate the value of a single motor to see if should move forward backward , remaing in the same direction of the other motor, or come to a stop

        Examples: Drive Forward = both motors move forward Drive Forward = both motors move backward SPIN = One motor moves forward while the other backward PIVOT = One motor moves is stop while the other moves

        Parameters:
        motorDirection - current left motor direction MotorDirection
        driveDirection - current vehicle drive direction DriveDirection
        power - current absolute power
        Returns:
        double current absolute power as a positive or negative number

      • rightPowerWithDirection

        public static double rightPowerWithDirection(MotorDirection motorDirection,
                                             DriveDirection driveDirection,
                                             double power)
        Helper method to derive the right motor power the DriveDirection Based of the vehicle Drive direction, calculate the value of a single motor to see if should move forward backward , remaing in the same direction of the other motor, or come to a stop

        Examples: Drive Forward = both motors move forward Drive Forward = both motors move backward SPIN = One motor moves forward while the other backward PIVOT = One motor moves is stop while the other moves

        Parameters:
        motorDirection - current right motor direction MotorDirection
        driveDirection - current vehicle drive direction DriveDirection
        power - current absolute power
        Returns:
        double current absolute power as a positive or negative number or zero value

      • getCurrentDirection
